showcase.tag.academic.description.message: People and things related to academia or schools.

feedback.description.message: 您的反馈对我们很重要！

feedback.welcome.description: The welcome title on the feedback page

feedback.paragraph.message: We cordially invite you to provide suggestions, ideas, and prompts to continuously enhance ChatGPT Shortcut, thereby improving personal efficiency and productivity. If you encounter any bugs, please provide the relevant link and details of the issue. When it comes to prompt suggestions, you may submit content in multiple languages or simply describe your thoughts on the desired prompts. We look forward to expanding our collective knowledge and generating high-quality outputs through these suggestions. Once your submitted prompts are published, your contributions will be credited on the page. You can search for entries associated with your contributor name (username).
feedback.paragraph.description: The main paragraph on the feedback page

tooltip.switchLang.message: Click to toggle the display language.

toggle_prompt_language_description.message: Change the display language of the prompt to toggle between English and the current language of the page.

info.communityPrompts.message: The prompts displayed on this page are shared and uploaded by netizens, we cannot guarantee the accuracy, quality or completeness of the content, and we also do not take responsibility for any legal liability arising from the content. If you find any infringement or other problems, you can contact us to deal with it. We will deal with it as soon as possible after receiving the notification.

description.communityPrompts.message: Explore the collection of innovative prompts shared by AiShort users, these unique and fun prompts can inspire you when creating short videos, novels, games and more. Vote for your favorite prompts, copy them and share them with your friends. Let Aishort help you open the door to creativity and create great work together.

comment.placeholder.message: Type your comment here... Support Markdown and HTML syntax.

homepage.title.message: AiShort (ChatGPT Shortcut) - A simple and user-friendly ChatGPT shortcut command list that doubles productivity!

homepage.description.message: AiShort is a tool designed for the efficient management and sharing of AI prompts. It enables users to easily customize, save, and share their prompts, while also offering access to a community-driven platform with thousands of publicly shared prompts, enhancing productivity for a variety of applications.
